snippet.title: Survival City Launch Trailer (HD)
snippet.description:
DOWNLOAD SURVIVAL CITY FOR FREE:
Get it on Google PlayStore: http://bit.ly/SURVIVEGP

HOW LONG CAN YOU SURVIVE?
The world is in chaos, the zombies are taking over and it's up to you to amass survivors and survive!

Fortify the strongest base and send survivors out on missions to gather resources and equipment to help you survive the night!

- More than 50 survivors to find! All with their own unique stories and missions
- Dozens of zombies types to discover and fight!
- More than 110+ weapons to collect
- Unique gameplay blends build & battle with tower defence

BUILD!
Survival City is a new type of base builder. Set within a post apocalyptic world rife with Zombies and the world in turmoil.

When the sun is out, build the biggest and most secure safezone you can, in preparation for when the sun sets and the evening comes!

DEFEND!
Then when the sun sets and the shadows creep in, players need to survive waves of zombies. Using their skill, players need to strategically use their survivals and loadout to resist the horde of zombies that attack.

SURVIVE!
How long can you last? Players need to survive as many days as possible, with each day getting progressively harder as the player progresses through the game!
